about_the_game:
TAKEOVER is a sexy hack and slash game.

What will you find in this demo?

You will jump directly into the action.

You will control one character: Fubuki GORO. She is the main character of the game and the only one available in this demo.

You will fight wave after wave of cyborgs. The model you will encounter in this Demo is the basic model X101 which is capable of basic single attack.

You will have access to all the combat skills that Fubuki owns.

When you die, you will have 2 choice basically:
Quit the game or restart the challenge!

content_descriptors.notes:
In this game, there are no pornographic content. In some japanese game or japanese folklore it is common to see "bra" and panties but the game will not show more.
If the player character receives damages it will result in the skirt and the shirt being removed to extent that the player character will be in complete lingerie.
Again, there is no pornographic features, it is just a fighting game where the player can see lingerie or bikini.

detailed_description:
TAKEOVER is a sexy hack and slash game.

What will you find in this demo?

You will jump directly into the action.

You will control one character: Fubuki GORO. She is the main character of the game and the only one available in this demo.

You will fight wave after wave of cyborgs. The model you will encounter in this Demo is the basic model X101 which is capable of basic single attack.

You will have access to all the combat skills that Fubuki owns.

When you die, you will have 2 choice basically:
Quit the game or restart the challenge!
name: Takeover Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: XP/ Vista / Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor / 2.6 GHz Intel Single Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: mouse keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Famille
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-11400H @ 2.70GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce FTX 3060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: mouse keyboard

short_description: Takeover is a fast paced SEXY hack and slash action game where you fight CYBORGS. "She" is waiting for you.
